overview: This architecture represents a hybrid cloud solution integrating on-premises resources with Azure services, supporting both traditional and containerized applications through a centralized control plane. It emphasizes security, performance, and manageability.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Core environment hosting virtual machines and applications.
security_considerations: Regular security updates and patches for the Azure Local instance.
Isolation of workloads to prevent lateral movement.
components.data_handling: Processes sensitive data in compliance with regulations.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest and in transit is encrypted.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Management interface for Azure services including Azure portal and CLI.
security_considerations: Audit logging for all administrative actions.
components.data_handling: Manages sensitive configuration and operational data.
components.encryption_status: All data is encrypted in transit.

components.name: Traditional Applications
components.description: Non-containerized applications running on Arc VMs.
security_considerations: Regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing.
Application whitelisting to prevent unauthorized execution.

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Containerized applications managed through Azure Kubernetes Service.
security_considerations: Network policies to control traffic between pods.
Regular scanning of container images for vulnerabilities.
components.encryption_status: Data in transit is encrypted using TLS.

components.name: Hyper-V
security_considerations: Isolation of VMs to prevent cross-VM attacks.
Regular updates to Hyper-V to mitigate vulnerabilities.
components.data_handling: Hosts multiple VMs with varying data sensitivity.

components.name: Storage Spaces Direct (S2D)
components.description: Storage solution for high availability and performance.
security_considerations: Data redundancy to prevent data loss.
vulnerabilities: Data loss due to hardware failure.

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Network components managing traffic and securing the environment.
security_considerations: Regular updates to firmware and software.
Intrusion detection and prevention systems (IDPS) in place.
components.encryption_status: VPNs used for secure remote access.

security_risks: Man-in-the-middle attacks if not properly secured.
Data leakage if monitoring data is not secured.

trust_boundaries.name: On-Premises to Azure Local
recommendations: Implement end-to-end encryption for all data transfers.
Regularly audit firewall rules and VPN configurations.
